pkgmetadata.longdescription: # phubblePersistent homology mapping telescope## How to build1. You will need a [rust toolchain](https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/getting-started/installation.html)2. Ideally, switch into a python virtual environment.3. Run `pip install maturin[zig]`4. Located in the `phubble` directory run```maturin dev --release```5. Within your virtual environment, you should now be able to```from phubble import build_telescope```
